items.sentence: I\'m sure Tom is going to like the cookies you baked for him.

If I can\'t stay here, I need to find somewhere else to stay.
There isn\'t anything anybody can do to avoid the inevitable.
I\'m more interested in spoken French than in written French.
Tom was the only one in our group who knew what was going on.
Would it be OK if I borrowed your bicycle tomorrow afternoon?
I wouldn\'t be surprised if you didn\'t have to pay anything.
Tom wasn\'t the only one who wanted to leave the party early.
There were a lot of people at the train station this morning.
